doc.knownrelatives: Cronus (father), Rhea (mother), Poseidon, Hades (brothers), Zeus (brother/husband), Persephone (daughter), Heracles, Ares, Hephaestus, Apollo, Hermes, Dionysus (nephews), Aphrodite, Pallas Athena, Artemis, Eileithyia, Hebe, Discord, Pandia, Helen (nieces),
doc.occupation: Goddess of grain and the harvest
doc.powers: Demeter possesses the conventional superhuman physical attributes of an Olympian Goddess, including much denser bones and flesh. Virtually immortal, she is immune to all diseases, nearly all toxins and can withstand extreme temperatures, pressures and most physical harm.
